item.title: Slide Rule
item.description: A slide rule is a calculator that refuses to speak in digits. It just… slides. This is a toy, not a lab instrument. The vibe is: approximate, tactile, smug. A (1–10) B (1–10) operation multiply (A × B) divide (A ÷ B) log scale (1 → 10) cursor: — result: — <svg id="rule" viewBox="0 0 1000 140" width="100%" height="140" role="img" aria-label="slide rule toy"> <rect x="10" y="20" width="980" height="40" rx="10" fill="white" stroke="rgba(0,0,0,.

item.title: Morged Generator
item.description: CONTINVOUCLY MORGED is a tiny bad-OCR / AI-slop text mangler. Type something. I will wash off the fingerprints and ship it worse. original morge it morge harder copy morged what this does random character swaps (rn→m, cl→d, vv→w) dropped vowels, duplicated consonants occasional ‘tim’ / ‘morged’ graffiti

item.title: Random Revisit
item.description: Welcome to Archive Tours. I’m your guide. Please keep your arms and tabs inside the window. Destination: (choosing…) Vehicle: one extremely suspicious hyperlink Departure: 5s reroll go now JavaScript off: try the plain archive: /posts/

item.title: Portal
item.description: This is a tiny curated list + a roulette button. take me somewhere no-js.club — club of javascript-freed sites 250KB club — performance list t0.vc — guestbook + projects nocss.club — no css. extreme mode ipaddress.sh — single-purpose page
